description:
ebookers Explorer, developed by leading online travel agency ebookers.com, allows you to discover the world through the power of social networks by sharing what others are saying, seeing and doing. The app pulls in travel photos, videos, blogs and tweets from the web to create a unique travel magazine tailored to your search.

Share the travel ideas you find through ebookers Explorer with friends & family by email, Facebook or Twitter. See what real people are saying about “Surfing in Sydney”, “Shopping in New York” or whether the “Cuisine in France” really lives up to its reputation! It is a real travel magazine for real travellers.

Features include: a beautifully presented page-turning travel magazine, socially generated content pulled from sites around the web: photos from Flickr, videos from YouTube, blogs from Google, tweets from Twitter and hotels from ebookers, featured searches on some of the most popular destinations and activities around the world, ability to share photos, videos, articles and hotels with friends & family by email, Facebook or Twitter, recent searches automatically saved.

Download now and start exploring the world with ebookers Explorer.
